title: Azir Attack Speed Bug
body:
On Butcher's Bridge during an ARAM I discovered that I was not being granted the bonus attack speed (20%) from Azir's Arise! (W) at rank 1 . This bonus attack speed was not granted until I put a skill point into it in which I then received the normal attack speed bonus (30% for rank 2). This may be due to the fact that you can not assign a skill point into his W upon spawning into the game but I'm not sure. All other attack speed bonuses were there and it was simply the bonus 20% not being applied.

Thanks for your time.
